content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Ah, Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to see the apartment first before deciding on a price. Can you show me around?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I'll be happy to give you a tour of the apartment. It's a cozy 25-square-meter space with modern amenities and a great location. Would you like to schedule a time for the tour?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to schedule a time for the tour tomorrow at 3 PM.
Please confirm the address of the apartment.
Thanks.
I agree to the price of x Euro.
TERMINATE
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Sure, Juan. The address of the apartment is 123 Main Street, New York. I'm glad you found the tour satisfactory and agreed to the rental price. If you have any questions or need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.
name: Heinrich Heine
